roleset.name: no longer interested in

role.descr: causer of lack of interest, agent

example.name: should have been parsed as an ADJ
example.text: [Some money managers]-1 are disenchanted *trace*-1 with H& R Block because they suspect the company's glory days are past, or at least passing.
example.arg: because they suspect the company's glory days are past, or at least passing.

roleset.note: DISENCHANT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'disenchant' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from disenchant.01-v predicate notes)
